data.fullContent: There are mainly two types of owners which are the unemployed middle-aged and the unlicensed hawkers. Both of them are the main support of their family while they can not find a suitable job. As a result, they choose to run the carful because it can help them make a decent living and avoid the high rent. The carful of these kinds are operated by family units.
data.answer: 业主主要分为两类，即失业的中年业主及无牌小贩。他们都是家庭的主要支柱，但他们找不到合适的工作。因此，他们选择开车，因为这可以帮助他们过上体面的生活，避免高额的租金。这类车辆由家庭单位操作。
